articles.author: Aya Wagatsuma, Yian Lee, James Mayger
articles.title: China Hits Out at Japan’s Takaichi for Meeting Taiwan’s Lin - Bloomberg
articles.description: China criticized Japan’s Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi for meeting with Taiwan officials on the sidelines of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit and her subsequent social media posts about the discussions.
